channel.title: Drawing on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Drawing on John Cosio

item.title: It’s more pun: Credit Card Debt
item.description: This here is the credit card debt(Death). The idea of puns and credit card debt(Death) I wanted to start with drawing stuff like these for a long time and share it. If my memory serves me right, I was talking about this idea with my friends and drew it for more details. After all, a picture is worth a thousand words. We know the bad of having credit cards and even worse if you are deep and maxed it.
